about_the_game:
Overview

HAMSUMO is an indie physics-based multiplayer game where up to 4 players can duke it out in the world's most adorable battle arena! Choose from a selection of cute, cool, and kooky hamsters to BONK YOUR FRIENDS!

Game Features

  • GO HAM with a hamster that fits your style! Choose from 6 different hamsters, each with their own look and personality!
  • Unleash the power of the cosmos with STAR MOVES! Each hamster has 3 unique Star Moves to experiment with. Learning to use them effectively can really turn the tables on your opponents!
  • Deep physics-based movement that is EASY TO LEARN and HARD TO MASTER! Whether you learn best in Practice Mode or in the heat of battle in Versus Mode, honing your roly-poly skills will be the difference between victory and defeat!
  • Play against your friends on the couch or BONK THE WORLD in Online Matches! 1v1, 2v2, or a full on 4-Player Free For All? The choice is yours!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3210 3.2 GHz / AMD A8-7600 APU 3.1 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated: Intel HD Graphics 4000 (Ivy Bridge) or AMD Radeon R5 series (Kaveri line) with OpenGL 4.41Discrete: Nvidia GeForce 400 Series or AMD Radeon HD 7000 series with OpenGL 4.4
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • VR Support: N/A

short_description: BONK YOUR FRIENDS in this action-packed, roly-poly, multiplayer action game! Choose your favorite hamster to duke it out with your friends in the most adorable (and explosive!) PvP arena! Unleash unique and powerful Star Moves to blast away the competition!
